summary: This module provides a Django test suite that verifies the correct automatic naming of many‑to‑many relationship columns, confirms that many‑to‑many tables are generated inside subpackage models, and checks that models are properly discovered within the test package.
business_intent: To guarantee that the model package reliably creates and names many‑to‑many database structures and that all models are correctly detected, thereby preventing schema errors and integration issues in the application.
